thumb.title: 歴史秘話 蓮池を仏も人も愛した 厳定院（弁財天）
thumb.description: 厳定院（弁財天） 東京都大田区池上２丁目１０−１２出典 Library of Congress,The lotus-flower, a typical game played by Japanese children during cherry-bloom festival, Tokyo, Jaban [i.e., Japan].2011649585 Lotus Blossom.Syracuse University https://onlinecollections.syr.edu/objects/31883/lotus-blossom Library of Congress,Sacred lotus, signifying.2020634404 Library of Congress,In the land of the lotus,--a corner in a Japanese garden, Tokio, Japan.2020634153 Shinobazu Pond Uyeno, Tokyo.Europeana https://www.europeana.eu/en/item/488/https___www_esbirky_cz_detail_231654 BGM All_the_Love byのる ナレーションは音読さん
